high.description: Turnover for 2019 on the Consolidated Profit and Loss Account (11,601,937) does not tie to Note 3 Segment Information breakdown (11,413,312). Note 3 value appears correct based on component sums.
Gross Profit (1,241,591) does not equal Turnover (11,601,937) minus Cost of Sales (10,221,721), which is 1,380,216. Using Note 3 turnover (11,413,312) would result in 1,191,591.
Total Margin (1,219,336) does not equal Gross Profit (1,241,591) plus Other Income (27,745), which sums to 1,269,336.

Intangible Assets on Balance Sheet (2,373,252) do not tie to the closing balance in Note 11 (2,298,948). This also causes the Non-Current Assets subtotal (2,940,021) to fail cross-footing against listed components.
Reserves on Balance Sheet (1,170,520) do not tie to SOCE total (1,250,520). Consequently, Share Capital + Reserves (1,184,206) does not sum to the reported Shareholders' Funds subtotal (1,264,206).
Total non-current assets subtotal (2,940,021) does not equal the sum of its components as printed (3,014,325). The discrepancy arises from the incorrect Intangible Assets value.
In SOCE, opening total equity (1,869,429) does not sum from components (1,216,892 + 680,804 - 3,150 = 1,894,546).
Opening balance for Perpetual Capital Securities (680,804) does not tie to prior year closing (655,687).
Retained earnings column in SOCE does not foot vertically to the closing balance of 443,582.
Net cash generated from operations on Cash Flow Statement (327,617) does not tie to reconciliation in Note 31a (317,102).
Net cash outflow from operating activities (280,854) does not equal Net cash generated (327,617) minus taxes paid. The subtotal is correct only if the Note 31a value (317,102) is used.
Opening cash balance for 2019 (612,931) does not tie to 2018 closing balance (612,391) or the total shown below it (612,391). Typo in Continuing Operations opening balance.
Supply Chain Solutions turnover is listed as 88,344,820, approximately 10x the segment total of 9,999,701. Sum of components 89,510,039 does not match reported total.
Note 8 Interim Dividend (15,962) does not foot to Total (10,962) and does not tie to SOCE (10,962).
Note 9 Employee share option expenses (12,010) does not tie to SOCE 'value of employee services' (13,312).
PPE Plant and machinery rollforward components sum to 80,660, but closing balance is 80,739.
Note 13 Opening balance for ROU Assets 2019 (384,296) does not match Closing balance 2018 (391,970).
Note 19 Related Party Ageing components sum to 545,669 (256,330 + 147,946 + 141,393), but Total is reported as 539,876.
Note 28 'Wholly repayable within 5 years' subtotal (1,538,851) does not equal sum of components (1,563,851).
Note 30 Deferred Tax summary opening balance (13,591) does not match prior year closing (13,951). Causes rollforward mismatch.
Note 30 Deferred Tax summary closing balance (24,953) does not match calculated rollforward sum (24,593) due to opening balance error.
Note 31a Operating profit before working capital changes subtotal (417,535) does not equal sum of adjustments (417,635).
Note 31b Lease liabilities opening balance (582,729) is incorrect; should be 420,628 to make rollforward work.
Note 33 Proceeds from disposal (300M) does not tie to Cash Flow/SOCE (287M).
Ten-Year Summary 2017 Turnover (1,353,420) is 10x smaller than adjacent years, likely typo.

medium.description: P&L Title incorrectly states 'For the year ended 31 December 2018' instead of 2019.
P&L 2019 column header incorrectly labeled 'HK$000' instead of 'US$000'.
P&L main section containing continuing operations is incorrectly labeled 'Discontinued Operations'.
Non-current assets section on Balance Sheet is incorrectly labeled 'Non-current liabilities'.
Current asset 'Due from related companies' is incorrectly labeled as 'Due to'.
Balance sheet column headers show duplicate 2018 dates or wrong years for 2019 data.
Balance Sheet 2018 column missing mandated '(Restated)' label.
Note 1.1(A) table header says 'As at 1 January 2019' but displays 2018 restatement data.
Note 3 Supplementary Analysis turnover column labeled 'HK$000' but contains US$ figures.
Note 3 2018 comparative column missing required '(Restated)' label.
Auditor remuneration expense total shown in parentheses (4,511) implying credit/income.
Note 13 ROU Assets 2018 column missing '(Restated)' label.
Note 21 titled 'Trade and Other Payables' but contains Receivables assets.
Cash balance asset shown in parentheses (932,167) implying liability/overdraft.
Reference to 'HKFRS 17 Leases' is incorrect (should be 16).
Note 3 table has duplicate '2019' headers for 2018 column.

low.description: Positive gross profit labeled as 'Gross loss'.
Positive net cash flow labeled as 'outflow'.
Inconsistent row labels for OCI in Deferred Tax Asset vs Liability tables.
Ten-Year summary labels for Shareholders Funds/Reserves inaccurately include NCI.
Minor tie mismatch in related party ageing Note 19 vs 38b.

raw_findings.description: The Consolidated Profit and Loss Account title incorrectly states 'For the year ended 31 December 2018' despite being the statement for 2019. The header correctly identifies it as the 2019 report.

The 2019 column header in the Consolidated Profit and Loss Account is labeled 'HK$\'000\' while all other statements and footnotes use 'US$\'000\'. Values match the US$ figures in the summary (Page 244).

Gross profit for 2019 ($1,241,591) does not foot. Turnover ($11,413,312) minus Cost of sales ($10,221,721) equals $1,191,591. The error also flows to the Total margin line where $1,241,591 + $27,745 results in $1,269,336, but the statement shows $1,219,336.
Intangible assets on the Consolidated Balance Sheet ($2,373,252) do not tie to the closing net book amount in Note 11 ($2,298,948). The difference is $74,304.
The 2018 comparative column on the Consolidated Balance Sheet (page 146) is missing the '(Restated)' label which appears correctly on pages 143, 145, and 147.
Reserves ($1,170,520) plus Share capital ($13,686) should equal the Shareholders' funds subtotal of $1,264,206. The correct/implied Reserves figure should be $1,250,520.

In the Consolidated Statement of Changes in Equity, the 'Balance at 1 January 2019, as previously reported' Total Equity ($1,869,429) does not sum from its components. Summing total shareholders' funds ($1,216,892), perps ($680,804), and NCI (-$3,150) results in $1,894,546.

The 'Balance at 1 January 2019, as previously reported' for Holders of perpetual capital securities ($680,804) does not tie to the 'Balance at 31 December 2018' in the prior year statement on page 149 ($655,687).
Turnover (11,601,937) minus Cost of sales (10,221,721) equals 1,380,216, but reported Gross profit is 1,241,591.
Gross profit (1,241,591) plus Other income (27,745) equals 1,269,336, but reported Total margin is 1,219,336.
Turnover on Profit and Loss Account (11,601,937) does not tie to total Turnover in Note 3 (11,413,312).
The Consolidated Profit and Loss Account title erroneously refers to 2018 ('For the year ended 31 December 2018') while the report is for 2019 and includes 2019 data.

The 2019 column header in the Consolidated Profit and Loss Account is labeled 'HK$000' whereas the 2018 column is 'US$000'. The values in the 2019 column are inconsistent with this label (they appear to be US$ based on note ties).
Intangible assets on Balance Sheet (2,373,252) does not tie to Closing net book amount in Note 11 (2,298,948). Cross-footing of total non-current assets also confirms the value should be 2,298,948.

Reserves on Balance Sheet (1,170,520) does not tie to the sum of share premium, other reserves, and retained earnings in the Statement of Changes in Equity (760,754 + 46,184 + 443,582 = 1,250,520). The subtotal 'Shareholders funds attributable to Company Shareholders' on the Balance Sheet correctly adds up using 1,250,520.
Cash and cash equivalents at 1 January 2019 for Continuing Operations is listed as 612,931, which does not tie to the total opening balance (612,391) or the prior year's closing balance (612,391).

The turnover table mixes currencies; Supply Chain Solutions is labeled 'HK$000' while Logistics Services and the total are 'US$000'. The math (~88m HK + ~1m US = ~10m US) is non-sensical unless labels are wrong.
The cash and bank balances in Note 22 are presented in brackets '(932,167)', which usually denotes a negative value or liability, despite being a current asset.
Note 13 reports a closing balance at 31 Dec 2018 of 391,970 but an opening balance at 1 Jan 2019 of 384,296 without explanation for the discrepancy.
The summary rollforward table for net deferred tax math: (13,591) - 11,184 + 558 - 1,007 + 631 equals (24,593), but the table reports (24,953).

The summary table for deferred tax shows a movement of 558 to other comprehensive income, but the component breakdowns in the same note show a net movement of 449 (1,647 asset credit - 1,198 liability charge).
Statement subtitle identifies the period as 'For the year ended 31 December 2018', while it should be 2019 for the current year's reporting.
The current year column header is labeled '2019 HK$000', but the report's presentation currency is US$ according to Note 1.4. The values also match US$ figures in the summary tables.
Turnover for 2019 on P&L (11,601,937) does not tie to Segment Information Note 3 (11,413,312) or the Ten-Year Financial Summary (11,413,312).
Gross profit calculation is incorrect. Turnover (11,601,937) less Cost of sales (10,221,721) equals 1,380,216, but statement shows 1,241,591.
Total margin calculation is incorrect. Gross profit reported (1,241,591) plus Other income (27,745) equals 1,269,336, but statement shows 1,219,336.
Gross profit line is labeled 'Gross loss' despite the reported value (1,241,591) being positive.
The first and second column headers both read '2018'. The first column should be '2019' based on the figures and context.
Intangible assets value on the Balance Sheet (2,373,252) does not tie to the breakdown in Note 11 (2,298,948).
The subtotal 'Shareholders\' funds attributable to the Companyâ€™s Shareholders' (1,264,206) does not equal the sum of its components: Share capital (13,686) + Reserves (1,170,520) = 1,184,206.
Reserves on the Balance Sheet (1,170,520) do not tie to the sum of the reserves columns in the Statement of Changes in Equity (760,754 + 46,184 + 443,582 = 1,250,520).
The cash and bank balances are presented in parentheses '(932,167)', which could be interpreted as a negative/overdraft balance, whereas it is shown as a positive asset elsewhere.

Maturity subtotal 'Wholly repayable within 5 years' (1,538,851) does not equal the sum of its components: Within 1 year (516,798) + Between 1 and 2 years (314,079) + Between 2 and 5 years (732,974) = 1,563,851.

Turnover for Supply Chain Solutions (88,344,820) does not sum with Logistics Services (1,173,277) and Elimination (8,058) to reach the subtotal (9,999,701). It appears to be an order of magnitude error.
Column headers show currency mismatch: 2019 is labeled 'HK$000' while 2018 is 'US$\'000'. The 2019 figures are clearly not in HK$, making this a labeling error.
Interim dividend for 2019 in Note 8 (15,962) does not tie to the Statement of Changes in Equity (10,962).
Total employee share option and share award expenses in Note 9 (12,010) does not tie to the 'value of employee services' total in the Statement of Changes in Equity (13,312).

Intangible assets on the Consolidated Balance Sheet (page 146) is stated as 2,373,252, but Note 11 (page 184) and the Ten-Year Financial Summary (page 245) show a closing balance of 2,298,948. This discrepancy also causes the subtotal for Non-current assets on the Balance Sheet to mismatch (sum of components = 3,014,325 vs reported subtotal of 2,940,021).

The asset line item for related company balances in Current Assets is mislabeled as 'Due to related companies'. As it is an asset, it should be 'Due from related companies'. A liability 'Due to' correctly appears in the Current Liabilities section.

The column header for 2019 in the Consolidated Profit and Loss Account is labeled 'HK$''000', but all figures in that column are actually expressed in US$''000, as confirmed by the summary on page 244 and all detailed notes.

The restatement table for HKFRS 16 is titled 'As at 1 January 2019', but the data in the columns (e.g. restated PPE of 187,943, Assets held for sale of 1,653,520) matches the 'As at 1 January 2018' restated column in the main Balance Sheet. The period should be 2018.

In the 'Turnover' breakdown for Services segment, the components for 2019 (88,344,820 + 1,173,277 - 8,058) sum to 89,510,039, but the reported total is 9,999,701. Furthermore, the column is labeled 'HK$''000' while the total and previous year are 'US$''000'. The SCS value 88,344,820 appears to be a typo for 8,834,482 (US$).

In Note 28, the maturity breakdown components for 2019 (516,798 + 314,079 + 732,974 + 54,540) sum to 1,618,391, but the reported total is 1,593,391. The subtotal 'Wholly repayable within 5 years' (1,538,851) also does not equal the sum of its three components (516,798 + 314,079 + 732,974 = 1,563,851).
In Note 19(a), the ageing components for 2019 (256,330 + 147,946 + 141,393) sum to 545,669, but the reported subtotal is 539,876.

In Note 22, the cash and bank balance for 2019 is shown in parentheses (932,167), implying a credit/overdraft. However, the Balance Sheet (page 146) and Cash Flow Statement (page 151) show this as a positive asset balance. Note 22 usage is inconsistent with Note 21 (Screenshot 17) where positive assets don't use parentheses.

Total auditor remuneration for 2019 is shown as (4,511) in parentheses, which is inconsistent with the prior year (6,670) and consistent with the rest of the 'Charging' section in Note 4 (p179), where expenses are shown as positive numbers.

Gross profit for 2019 is stated as 1,241,591. Re-calculating as Turnover (11,413,312) minus Cost of sales (10,221,721) gives 1,191,591. Additionally, Total margin (1,219,336) minus Other income (27,745) gives 1,191,591.

The column header for the 2019 figures in the Consolidated Profit and Loss Account incorrectly uses 'HK$000' as the currency label, whereas the rest of the statements use 'US$000' and the figures are numerically consistent with US dollars.

Intangible assets on the Consolidated Balance Sheet are stated as 2,373,252. Note 11 showing the breakdown and rollforward of Intangible Assets (page 184) shows a closing net book amount of 2,298,948.

Reserves on the Consolidated Balance Sheet are stated as 1,170,520. However, the sum of its components in the Statement of Changes in Equity (page 148) - Share premium (760,754), Other reserves (46,184), and Retained earnings (443,582) - is 1,250,520. Furthermore, adding Share capital (13,686) to the stated Reserves (1,170,520) equals 1,184,206, which does not match the stated subtotal 'Shareholders' funds' of 1,264,206. Using the expected Reserves of 1,250,520 results in 13,686 + 1,250,520 = 1,264,206.

'Net cash generated from operations' in the Consolidated Cash Flow Statement is stated as 327,617 and references Note 31(a). Note 31(a) (page 211) shows 'Net cash generated from operations' as 317,102. The Cash Flow subtotal 'Net cash outflow from operating activities' (280,854) is correctly calculated based on 317,102 (317,102 - 1,129 - 35,119 = 280,854).

In the Property, Plant and Equipment rollforward, the calculated total closing cost should be 409,299 (Opening 364,929 minus exchange 608 plus additions 48,072 minus disposals 3,094), but the table states 390,939. This discrepancy of 18,360 is also present in the Accumulated Depreciation rollforward.

In Note 22, the 'Cash and bank balances' value is presented in brackets as (932,167). As this is an asset and presented as a positive number on the Balance Sheet, the use of brackets (typically signifying a negative or liability amount) is inconsistent and potentially misleading.

Opening balance 'At 1 January' 2019 for net deferred tax in the summary table of Note 30 is US$13,591,000, which does not match the closing balance 'At 31 December' 2018 of US$13,951,000 from the prior year comparative column (same table). Using the correct US$13,951,000 opening balance correctly adds up to the closing balance of US$24,953,000.

In Note 28 (Maturity of financial liabilities table), the subtotal 'Wholly repayable within 5 years' for 2019 is US$1,538,851,000, but the sum of its components ('Within 1 year': 516,798; 'Between 1 and 2 years': 314,079; 'Between 2 and 5 years': 732,974) is US$1,563,851,000.

In Note 3 (Supplementary analysis for the Services segment), the total turnover for 2019 of 9,999,701 does not equal the sum of its components (Supply Chain Solutions: 88,344,820 + Logistics Services: 1,173,277 - Elimination: (8,058) = 89,510,039). Note 3 on page 175 confirms the correct total is US$9,999,701,000, suggesting a typo in the Supply Chain Solutions value.
The turnover table for the Services segment in the supplementary analysis is incorrectly labeled 'HK$\'000' while the values match the 'US$\'000' values presented elsewhere in Note 3.

On the Consolidated Balance Sheet for 2019, 'Reserves' is reported as US$1,170,520,000. However, sum of its components in the Statement of Changes in Equity (Note 26) is US$1,250,520,000. The reported 'Shareholders\' funds' total of US$1,264,206,000 correctly sums the share capital and the US$1,250,520,000 reserve value, confirming the 1,170,520 value is an error (13,686 + 1,170,520 = 1,184,206).

In Note 19(a), the ageing table for trade amounts due from other related companies fails to cross-foot. The sum of the components (256,330 + 147,946 + 141,393) is US$545,669,000, but the total is reported as US$539,876,000.

In Note 8 (Dividends), the interim dividend paid for 2019 is reported as US$15,962,000, which does not tie to the US$10,962,000 reported in the Consolidated Statement of Changes in Equity (page 148) and the Company's Reserve Movement (page 230).

On the Consolidated Profit and Loss Account, 2019 Turnover from Continuing Operations is reported as US$11,601,937,000, which does not tie to the US$11,413,312,000 reported in the Note 3 segment breakdown on page 178.
The 2019 column header for the Consolidated Profit and Loss Account is incorrectly labeled 'HK$\'000' whereas the reporting currency is US$ and all other statement items match US$ values in notes.

The 2018 comparative column for Right-of-use Assets in Note 13 is missing the mandated '(Restated)' label. Per Note 1.1(A), these figures were restated upon the adoption of HKFRS 16, and the label correctly appears in the corresponding line item on the Consolidated Balance Sheet.

The 2018 comparative column in the supplementary turnover tables of Note 3 is missing the '(Restated)' label, despite the data being restated and correctly labeled on the preceding page and on the face of the Profit and Loss Account.

In Note 3 supplementary analysis for 2019, the turnover for 'Supply Chain Solutions' is listed as 88,344,820, which is mathematically inconsistent with the Services segment total of 9,999,701. Based on the 2018 values and the 2019 total, the correct value should be 8,834,482.

In Note 3, the column header for 2019 turnover analysis by activity is labeled 'HK$''000', but the total (9,999,701) and comparative 2018 values tie to US$ figures in standard segment reporting (Note 3, page 175). It should be labeled 'US$''000'.

The 2019 column header for the Profit and Loss account is labeled 'HK$''000', but all figures in that column match the US$ values reported in the notes (e.g., Operating Profit 148,318 Ties to Note 3/4 in US$). It should be labeled 'US$''000'.

Turnover on the face of the P&L (11,601,937) does not tie to the total reported in the Segment Information Note 3 (11,413,312 on page 175). Comparing Note 4 'Cost of inventories sold' (10,221,721) and P&L Gross Profit calc, the 11.4M figure from Note 3 appears correct.

Gross profit on the face of the P&L (1,241,591) is mathematically inconsistent with Turnover (11,601,937) and Cost of Sales (10,221,721). 11,601,937 - 10,221,721 = 1,380,216. Conversely, if Note 3 turnover (11,413,312) is used, Gross Profit should be 1,191,591.

Total margin (1,219,336) is shown as the sum of Gross profit (1,241,591) and Other income (27,745), but these components actually sum to 1,269,336. Total margin ties to Note 3, suggesting the components on the face of the P&L are incorrect.
Intangible assets for 2019 on the Balance Sheet (2,373,252) do not tie to the ending net book value in the rollforward in Note 11 (2,298,948 on page 184).

On the Balance Sheet, the sum of Share capital (13,686) and Reserves (1,170,520) is shown as 1,264,206, but the actual sum is 1,184,206. Based on the Statement of Changes in Equity, the correct value for Reserves should be 1,250,520.
Net cash generated from operations on the Cash Flow Statement (327,617) does not tie to the reconciliation in Note 31(a) (317,102 on page 211).

Net cash outflow from operating activities (280,854) is presented as the sum of Net cash generated from ops (327,617) less taxes (1,129 and 35,119). However, 327,617 - 1,129 - 35,119 = 291,369. Using the correct Note 31(a) value (317,102) instead of 327,617 leads to the reported total of 280,854.

In Note 22, Cash and bank balances are shown as (932,167) in parentheses, which usually indicates a negative or credit balance. However, the Balance Sheet presents this as a positive asset of 932,167, and the 2018 comparative in the same note correctly lacks parentheses.

In the net deferred tax movement rollforward, the 'At 1 January' balance for 2019 is shown as (13,591). However, the restated ending balance for 2018 in the comparative column is (13,951). The 2019 rollforward only sums correctly if starting from (13,951).

Column header for 2019 lists currency as 'HK$000', while the 2018 column is in 'US$000'. The values in the 2019 column are also actually in US dollars, as they tie to other Consolidated Financial Statements in the report.
Turnover for 2019 is reported as 11,601,937, which does not tie to Note 3 (Segment Information) on page 175, which reports Turnover of 11,413,312 US$'000.

Gross Profit of 1,241,591 does not equal Turnover (11,601,937) minus Cost of Sales (10,221,721), which should be 1,380,216. Note that if the correct Turnover from Note 3 (11,413,312) were used, the Gross Profit would be 1,191,591.
Heading 'Non-current liabilities' is incorrectly placed above the list of Non-current assets (Intangible assets, Property, plant and equipment, etc.). This should be 'Non-current assets'.
Intangible assets of 2,373,252 do not tie to Note 11 (Intangible Assets) on page 184, which reports a closing net book amount of 2,298,948 for 2019.

The subtotal for Non-current assets of 2,940,021 does not equal the sum of its listed components (2,373,252 + 195,876 + 383,802 + 15 + 6,274 + 2,737 + 25,421 + 26,948 = 3,014,325). The reported subtotal correctly uses the intended value for Intangibles from Note 11 (2,298,948), proving the line item itself is incorrectly listed on the Balance sheet.

Reserves of 1,170,520 do not tie to the sum of reserve components (Share premium + Other reserves + Retained earnings) in the Consolidated Statement of Changes in Equity on page 148 (760,754 + 46,184 + 443,582 = 1,250,520).

Shareholders' funds of 1,264,206 does not equal Share capital (13,686) + Reserves (1,170,520), which is 1,184,206. The reported subtotal correctly uses the intended Reserves figure from Note 26/SOCR (1,250,520).
Net cash generated from operations of 327,617 in the Cash Flow statement does not tie to Note 31(a) on page 211, which reports 317,102.

Net cash outflow from operating activities of 280,854 does not equal the sum of the components shown (327,617 - 1,129 - 35,119 = 291,369). The subtotal correctly uses the intended value from Note 31(a) (317,102).

Opening cash and cash equivalents (Continuing Operations) of 612,931 does not match the closing cash at 31 December 2018 reported on the Balance Sheet (612,391, page 146). Comparison of the 2019 ending balance proves that the opening balance should be 612,391 for the statement to cross-foot.

Note 8 lists 2019 interim dividend as 15,962, but the Consolidated Statement of Changes in Equity (page 148) and the Ten-Year Financial Summary (page 244) show the value as 10,962. Note 8 also fails to correctly sum its components (15,962 + 0 is reported as 10,962).

The opening balance for 2019 in the net deferred tax rollforward is reported as (13,591). However, the 31 December 2018 net deferred tax asset (15,644) less liability (1,693) reported on the Balance Sheet (page 146) is 13,951. Calculation of the 2019 closing balance also proves the opening balance should be (13,951).

The table header 'As at 1 January 2019' is incorrect as the values listed correspond to the restated 1 January 2018 balances (which match the restated 1 January 2018 column on the Balance Sheet, page 147).

Page 150 - Net cash outflow from operating activities (280,854) for 2019 does not foot with its components: 327,617 (Net cash generated) - 1,129 (HK tax) - 35,119 (Overseas tax) = 291,369. Note that using the correct cash generated from Note 31(a) of 317,102 would result in the reported 280,854.
Page 150 - 'Net cash generated from operations' of 327,617 does not tie to Note 31(a) on page 211, which shows 317,102.
Page 146 - Intangible assets of 2,373,252 for 31 December 2019 does not tie to Note 11 on page 184, which shows a closing net book amount of 2,298,948.

Page 146 - The subtotal for Non-current assets (labeled 'Non-current liabilities' in error) of 2,940,021 for 2019 does not foot with the listed items: 2,373,252 (Intangibles) + 195,876 (PPE) + 383,802 (ROU) + 15 (Prepaid land) + 6,274 (Assoc) + 2,737 (FVOCI) + 25,421 (Rec) + 26,948 (DTX) = 3,014,325. Note that using the correct Intangible value from Note 11 (2,298,948) would result in the reported subtotal.
Page 146 - Header 'Non-current liabilities' is used for the non-current assets section (referencing assets such as Intangible assets, PPE, etc.).

Page 147 - 'Reserves' of 1,170,520 for 31 December 2019 does not tie to the sum of reserve components in the Statement of Changes in Equity (page 148): 760,754 (Share premium) + 46,184 (Other reserves) + 443,582 (Retained earnings) = 1,250,520. Mismatch of 80,000.
Page 147 - Shareholders' funds of 1,264,206 for 2019 does not foot with its components: 13,686 (Share capital) + 1,170,520 (reported Reserves) = 1,184,206. Mismatch of 80,000.

Page 147 - Total equity for 'As at 1 January 2018 (Restated)' is reported as 2,900,629 but the sum of components shown (1,734,680 + 1,158,687 + 74,262) is 2,967,629. This is due to the 'Written put option on non-controlling interests' of (67,000) being shown as a dash in this column despite the SOCE (page 149) confirming its existence at that date.

Page 177 - Supply Chain Solutions Turnover for 2019 is reported as 88,344,820 HK$'000. However, the Services segment total turnover on the same page is 9,999,701 US$'000. If converted at standard rates or compared to page 178 (8,823,111 US$'000), this number is significantly overstated or in the wrong units. Furthermore, the math in the 2019 column (88M + 1M) does not foot to the 9.9M total.
Page 177 - Turnover table header for column 2018 is US$'000 based on page 176 data, but page 177 sub-header says HK$'000. Values for 2018 match the US$'000 figures from other notes.
Page 195 - Note 22 'Cash and bank balances' is shown as negative (932,167), but the Balance Sheet on page 146 and Cash Flow Statement on page 151 show a positive cash balance of 932,167.

Page 204 - 'Wholly repayable within 5 years' subtotal of 1,538,851 for 2019 does not foot: 516,798 (Within 1 year) + 314,079 (Between 1 and 2 years) + 732,974 (Between 2 and 5 years) = 1,563,851. Mismatch of 25,000.
Page 209 - Note 30 movement in net deferred tax rollforward: -13,591 (At 1 Jan) - 11,184 (PL) + 558 (OCI) - 1,007 (Hedging) + 631 (Exchange) = -24,593, but reported as -24,953. Mismatch of 360.
Page 211 - Operating profit before working capital changes subtotal of 417,535 for 2019 does not foot with its individual adjustment components; the correct sum is 417,635. Mismatch of 100.
The title of the Consolidated Profit and Loss Account on page 143 is 'For the year ended 31 December 2018', but it should be 2019 as it contains 2019 data.
The 2019 column header in the Consolidated Profit and Loss Account on page 143 is labeled 'HK$ 000', but consistent with the rest of the report and matching Note 3 values, it should be 'US$ 000'.
Turnover for 2019 on the Profit and Loss Account (page 143) is 11,601,937, but Note 3 (page 175) shows 11,413,312.
Gross profit for 2019 on page 143 (1,241,591) does not equal Turnover (11,601,937) minus Cost of sales (10,221,721), which is 1,380,216.
Total margin for 2019 on page 143 (1,219,336) does not equal Gross profit (1,241,591) plus Other income (27,745), which sums to 1,269,336.
Net cash generated from operations for 2019 on the Consolidated Cash Flow Statement (page 150) is 327,617, but Note 31(a) (page 211) shows 317,102.

Net cash outflow from operating activities for 2019 on page 150 (280,854) is incorrectly calculated based on the printed head line of 327,617. Using 327,617 - 1,129 (HK tax) - 35,119 (Overseas tax) results in 291,369. The subtotal 280,854 only works if the first line was 317,102.
